entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher who assigns a lesson to divide students into pairs and attempt to jinx each other without speaking. He ignores Hermione's successful repel of Neville's Jelly-Legs Jinx.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who thinks that Hermione's feat would have earned her twenty points for Gryffindor from any reasonable teacher.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who successfully repels Neville's Jelly-Legs Jinx without speaking.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who attempts to jinx Hermione with the Jelly-Legs Jinx.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Hermione successfully repels Neville's Jelly-Legs Jinx without speaking.
Harry observes Hermione's successful feat of repelling the jinx.
